Review.Titre: Easier perhaps only for people who code
Review.Contenu: This is only for people with advanced knowledge of GTM and tagging. This does not make it "easier" {website claims "Easiest Way to Server-side Tracking} in terms of "if you don't code, you can still do this." The knowledge base are written for search engines not humans. In their help videos, everything is already set-up and they are giving a tour, not showing how to set it up.Do NOT buy this without paying someone to set it up for you, that is what will make it "easier." Or course, they are happy to provide you with a quote to bill you for setting it up, when their support is utterly confusing and unhelpful - they will just send you copies of the 2,000 word blog posts you have already read.

Review.Titre: Terrible service, no assistance!
Review.Contenu: We have been their customers since January 2021, but their service has never worked. The assistance is NON-EXISTENT, poor, they don't solve any kind of problem and they switch to sending emails by unloading the barrel of problems on other services such as Facebook or Leadsbridge. I'm really tired, we are wasting a lot of time, money and resources because all their server side tracking is busted, we have NEVER had a social marketing campaign that has proper tracking due to the inefficiency of stape. The clear proof is that using a custom audience created on Salesmanago the campaigns work, but stape reads the purchase event quadrupling it!! so it's totally screwed. Our technical team spends a lot of time verifying their errors and NONE OF THEM makes themselves available. Terrible, Never again, stay away!

Review.Titre: I would like to recommend this hosting…
Review.Contenu: I would like to recommend this hosting for all the marketers, and especially for those, who like me, was interested in Stape's power-up Cookie Keeper. It has made managing our website cookies a cakewalk while keeping the budget untouched. Also, additional thanks for such an easy interface and free guides.

Review.Titre: We had an incredible experience with…
Review.Contenu: We had an incredible experience with Stape's team and their service. They are always ready to give an advice or provide a step-by-step guidence. As everyone writes it here: also special thanks for the blog posts - they are very useful. So, with no hesitation we're putting 5 stars!

Review.Contenu: I've come across the most user-friendly and bought-friendly service to date. Stape's blog is truly captivating, and I effortlessly found everything I needed without any trouble. Didn't have any problem with the support, so I can recommend Stape to everyone.

Review.Contenu: Stape's hosting works like magic for me. Its tracking power-ups help me to track the websites easily and provide me with accurate results. Also thank you for the videos and support.

Review.Contenu: I started using stape because I saw they have EU hosting. It provides lots of benefits and power-ups every company can use. As I've been using stape for a while, I can't find any problems or tell complaints at all. So I would like to recommend it here for everyone.

Review.Titre: Stape provides the best hosting service…
Review.Contenu: Stape provides the best hosting service for server GTM in the market so far. We've been currently using Stape EU to make sure that our tracking is GDPR compliant. Their team helped us to solve all the issues without putting any effort. Glad to hire them and would highly recommend.

Review.Titre: I am super happy to have found stape.
Review.Contenu: I am super happy to have found stape. Their support answered all of my questions and provided me with video setups. Their prices are pleasantly surprising and overall, I am very satisfied.

Review.Contenu: Stape made server-side traking really easy.  It is a very user-friendly site with lots of free tags,  power-ups and variables. We just paid for our plan (it depended on the requests by the way), and activated our container - that's it!  Now we can just continue working in sGTM.  Marvellous!

Review.Contenu: I worked with Stape and especially Dan on multiple tracking projects and it was always a 10/10 experience. Besides this they are nice people to work with and I would definitely recommend working with them!

Review.Contenu: Thanks for being on top of all trends in the website tracking niche. They helped us a lot when needed to make Google Analytics tracking compliant with the GDPR rules. The only solution we could find is stape EU hosting, which is easy to set up and anonymize user data.

Review.Contenu: The speed and performance of my website have significantly improved since I switched to this Stape.io hosting service. Pages load quickly, providing a smooth and seamless browsing experience for my visitors. This has had a positive impact on my website's user engagement and search engine rankings.

Review.Titre: Stape is taking our agency clients' server....
Review.Contenu: Stape is taking our agency clients' server-side tracking to the next level with their contribution to Google Tag Manager template gallery. We can always count on Stape for quality support and swift responses, making it as easy-as-pie to get all your questions answered!

Review.Titre: The Stape.io team was incredible
Review.Contenu: The Stape.io team was incredible! From helping us navigate exactly what we needed to better track our, to supporting us post set up. They even finished the project days ahead of schedule. First class the entire time.

Those who have tried using GCP or AWS for GTM containers will immediately realize how good Stape is. Deploying container in a few clicks, cheaper than GCP or AWS + a lot of useful information in the blog and community section. Thanks for making my life easier.

Review.Titre: If I could rate them ten stars I would
Review.Contenu: The team at Stape are easily the most knowledgable and efficient developers I've worked with in my 20 year career.They've provided invaluable and expert support across several projects, and without their help, we would not have several mission-critical integrations in place.So far they've helped us with Google Tag Manager Server and Hubspot integrations, as well as Google Cloud and Pub/Sub setups. All of these projects have gone flawlessly.I can say without reservation that I have absolute confidence in their ability, and I trust them implicitly.On top of all that they are an absolute pleasure to deal with. Dan, Denis and the team, are lovely people, and excellent communicators.We have a tonne more work for them, and I look forward to our next project.
